remarks: The square function is one-to-one for nonnegative reals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
resqcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
lt2sqd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
lt2sqd.3 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
lt2sqd.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ B ) $.
sq11d.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( A ^ 2 ) = ( B ^ 2 ) ) $.
sq11d $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
